casebody.data:
Robert A. RUCHO, et al., appellants,
v.
COMMON CAUSE, et al. No. 18-422. Supreme Court of the United States March 15, 2019. Joint motion of appellees for enlargement of time for oral argument and for divided argument granted in part, and the time is divided as follows: 35 minutes for appellants, 20 minutes for appellees Common Cause, et al., and 15 minutes for appellees League of Women Voters of North Carolina, et al.
